org.jamwiki.model

Class Topic

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jamwiki.model.Topic
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class Topic
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Provides an object representing a Wiki topic.
    See Also:

    • Constructor Detail

      • Topic

        public Topic(String virtualWiki,
             Namespace namespace,
             String pageName)
        Initialize a topic, passing in the virtual wiki, namespace and page name. Note that page name does NOT include namespace, so for a topic of "Help:Help Page" the page name is "Help Page".

      • Topic

        public Topic(Topic topic)

        public String getName()
